trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that accelerates and/or decelerates using an exponential formula.
trans-unit.target: 表示建立的動畫加速或減速使用指數的公式加/減速函數。

trans-unit.source: You can control whether the animation accelerates, decelerates or both by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制是否在動畫加速、 減速或兩者都指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下圖示範不同的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。")

trans-unit.source: The formula used for this function is the following.
trans-unit.target: 此函式所使用的公式如下所示。

trans-unit.source: ![Mathematical formula for ExponentialEase](~/add/media/exponentialease-formula.png "Mathematical formula for ExponentialEase") Using the formula above, the following graph illustrates the effect of several different values for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent%2A> property: ![Exponential Ease for three Exponent values](~/add/media/expo-easeproperty.png "Exponential Ease for three Exponent values") There are several other easing functions besides ExponentialEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: ![ExponentialEase 的數學公式](~/add/media/exponentialease-formula.png "ExponentialEase 的數學公式")使用上述公式下, 圖示範數個不同值的影響<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent%2A>屬性︰![指數的三個指數值加/減速](~/add/media/expo-easeproperty.png "指數的三個指數值加/減速")還有數個其他 easing 函式以外，您可以內容探索如何使用下列的 Silverlight 範例 ExponentialEase。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [執行此範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)除了使用加/減速函數包含在執行階段中，您可以透過繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>建立您自己自訂的加/減速函數

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 物件項目用法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 當建立衍生的類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>間接繼承動畫類別

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>建構自訂動畫物件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: 提供您可以覆寫以產生的 easing 函式的邏輯部分<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref>自訂 easing 函式的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來轉換控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>的大小寫</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>的動畫的速度的標準化的時間

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定您加/減速函數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>因為大小寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>方法轉換`normalizedTime`如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>案例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的標準化的時間 （進度）。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Double 值，表示已轉換的進度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exponent used to determine the interpolation of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來判斷在插補的動畫的指數。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.ExponentProperty> The formula used by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase> is the following.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.ExponentProperty>所使用的公式<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase>如下所示。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.ExponentProperty>

trans-unit.source: ![Mathematical formula for ExponentialEase](~/add/media/exponentialease-formula.png "Mathematical formula for ExponentialEase") Using the previous formula, the following graph illustrates the effect of several different values for the Exponent property: ![Exponential Ease for three Exponent values](~/add/media/expo-easeproperty.png "Exponential Ease for three Exponent values") ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ![ExponentialEase 的數學公式](~/add/media/exponentialease-formula.png "ExponentialEase 的數學公式")使用上一個公式下, 圖示範指數屬性的數個不同值的影響︰![指數的三個指數值加/減速](~/add/media/expo-easeproperty.png "指數的三個指數值加/減速") # # XAML 屬性使用方式 ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The exponent used to determine the interpolation of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷在插補的動畫指數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 2.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 2。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase.Exponent*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
